meanings.sent1: Her emotivity was evident in the way she teared up at sad movies.
meanings.sent2: His emotivity made it easy for others to understand his feelings.
meanings.sent3: The emotivity of the puppy's eyes made everyone in the room smile.
meanings.sent4: The emotivity of the music touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The emotivity of the painting evoked strong emotions in the viewers.
